duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain manufacturing equipment, focusing on mechanical, hydraulic, and pneumatic equipment.
Manage spare parts inventory, evaluate needs, recommend acquisitions, and assist in maintaining the spare parts database.
Study, diagnose, and troubleshoot complex machine and equipment malfunctions or maintenance problems and take corrective and preventive action.
Use acquired knowledge on equipment malfunctions to build and improve the preventive maintenance plan.
Assure execution of preventive and corrective maintenance plans, oversee completion, and take appropriate action to ensure timely and effective execution.
Keep track of and document maintenance work performed and changes made to equipment in the appropriate preventive maintenance database.
Coordinate the usage of third-party maintenance resources, ensure they possess the necessary skills, information, tools, and materials.
Provide orientation and training on maintenance tasks for the production crews.
Maintain a safe working environment by ensuring compliance of safety and environmental rules and regulations and recommend ideas for improvement.
Keep inventory of spare parts and tools organized and correctly documented.
Support the 24-hour operation of the facility and be on-call.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, Vocational/Technical Certifications desired
